Articles.Content:
I'm looking for a mod that allowed you to program your sepratrons during landing to bring your velocity down to a specific speed at a specific height. This is a mirror of the rockets on the Soyuz capsule that brings its velocity down right before landing.

This mod exists, I've seen it. I just cant locate it.
I think you can do this with kOS. You'll essentially get a lua-like programmable interface with which you can write a program that the spacecraft will carry out.
I believe you're looking for this mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/61294-WIP-XT-Landertron-Smart-Retrorockets-for-Landers-and-Spaceplanes-v0-06a-12-28?highlight=retro+rockets

I believe you're looking for this mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/61294-WIP-XT-Landertron-Smart-Retrorockets-for-Landers-and-Spaceplanes-v0-06a-12-28?highlight=retro+rockets

BINGO! that is it!
